PROJECTS.TITLE: My Projects
PROJECTS.INTRO: Discover here some concrete achievements made in companies or schools, illustrating my engineering journey and my passion for technical innovation.

PROJECT1.TITLE: S.DOT network equipment configuration bench
PROJECT1.CONTEXT: End-of-studies project for the BTS in Systems Maintenance at the Bischheim Industrial Technicentre
PROJECT1.PROBLEM: New network equipment is installed in TER trains during their mid-life renovation operations (OPTER Operation), however the configuration is complicated due to their dispersion in hard-to-access areas of the train
PROJECT1.SOLUTION: Creation of a bench in the form of an IT rack that can accommodate all network equipment of a trainset, enabling configuration in a single masked-time operation
PROJECT1.GAINS: Reduction of task time from 2 agents over 2 shifts with train immobilization, to 1 agent for 1 shift in masked time
PROJECT1.IMG_CAPTION: Photo of the prototype bench at the Bischheim Industrial Technicentre

PROJECT2.TITLE: Interactive Troubleshooting Booklet application
PROJECT2.PROBLEM: Maintenance documentation for trains maintained at SNCF maintenance centers is scattered across multiple document references and there is no tool organizing and keeping up-to-date the maintenance documents
PROJECT2.SOLUTION: Creation of a web and mobile document search application with a database linking train specificities to corresponding schematics
PROJECT2.GAINS: 75% reduction in document search time for newly trained staff

PROJECT3.TITLE: S.DOT network equipment configuration bench
PROJECT3.CONTEXT: Continuation and improvement of the BTS project during engineering school studies
PROJECT3.PROBLEM: New network equipment is installed in TER trains during their mid-life renovation operations (OPTER Operation), however these network devices are scattered throughout the train in hard-to-access areas and configuration tasks are very time-consuming
PROJECT3.SOLUTION: Creation of a bench in the form of an IT rack that can accommodate all network equipment of a trainset, enabling automatic and centralized configuration on a set of network equipment in masked time
PROJECT3.IMG_CAPTION: 3D model of the configuration bench rack
